heroDesc: MMORPG bot made by a player. Automates heals, mana, buffs and pet for your support classes. Perfect for Priest, Cleric, Dancer, Bard.
feature1Desc: HP, Mana, Buffs, Pet managed auto. You play, Reborn handles rest.
feature2Desc: Everything stays on your PC. Zero tracking, zero collection.
feature3Desc: Set your combos. CTRL+A to start, CTRL+O to stop.
feature4Desc: Reborn, Neon, Obsidian, Cyber, Matrix, Sakura. Change anytime.

securityFullDesc: Reborn Assistant uses professional banking-level security standards. Your credentials protected by JWT encryption, payments secured via Stripe, data stays 100% local. No tracking, no data resale.
pricingSubtitle: Choose the plan that suits you. No commitment.

faqSubtitle: Everything you need to know before getting started.
faq1Q: Does the free trial require a credit card?
faq1A: Yes, a card is required for the trial, but you won't be charged during the first 7 days. You can cancel anytime before the trial period ends.
faq2A: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade at any time from your client area. No change fees.
faq3Q: Does the Lifetime plan really include all future updates?
faq3A: Absolutely. The Lifetime plan guarantees access to all future updates and new features, without ever paying anything more.
faq4A: All your data remains stored locally on your device. We don't collect any personal data and use no tracking or telemetry.
faq5A: Contact us directly by email at seymoon-cell@gmail.com. Premium subscribers get priority response.
